title: Log File Locator
description: Identify system log files. These files are important for tracking events and always end with a specific three-letter extension.
solutionSummary: This pattern uses the backslash `\` to escape the dot, treating it as a literal character instead of a wildcard. The dollar sign `$` is an anchor that ensures the pattern matches only at the end of the string, correctly identifying files with the '.log' extension.
